General.Name: Ledesma SAAI
General.Description: Ledesma Sociedad Anónima Agrícola Industrial produces and sells agro-industrial products in Argentina. The company offers sugar, paper and copybooks, alcohol and bioethanol, fruits and citric juices, meat and grains, and cereals. It also produces energy from renewable sources. Ledesma Sociedad Anónima Agrícola Industrial is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
General.Address: Av. Corrientes 415Av. Corrientes 415Av., Buenos Aires, Argentina, C1043AAE
